price: They[20] said, “We have greater wealth and more children, and we will not be punished”.
arabic: وَقَالُواْ نَحۡنُ أَكۡثَرُ أَمۡوَٰلٗا وَأَوۡلَٰدٗا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
footnotes: [20] i.e., the affluent ones of the people of Makkah and others.
